definitions.definition: to speak about something quickly, giving little detail or using few words:
examples: I'll mention your ideas to Jacinta.

definitions.definition: to refer to something or someone:
examples: I promised never to mention the incident again.

definitions.definition: a short remark or written statement:
examples: The story didn't even get a mention in the newspaper.

definitions.definition: an occasion when something or someone is mentioned:
examples: Even the mention of her name makes him blush.

definitions.definition: an occasion when a person is publicly praised for having done something, such as their job, extremely well:
examples: At the awards ceremony, Chrissie Scott got/received a special mention for her reporting on the conflict.
